name: Unstabubble
description:
Story:

You are a cool capsule man with, also, a cool blue sunglasses. But one day, you find yourself trapped in cold and lonely facility. Soon you realize this facilty created to test “a super risky, game-changing, powerful war machine: A Bubble Gun”. You need to escape from this facility: with only using this overpowered gun! But as you know, bubbles are: wobbly, sensitive and unstable -they are always ready to POP!

Unstabubble is a puzzle/platformer about a capsule man with a bubble gun. You need to figure out how to use your bubble gun in different ways as you progress each unique level.

Controls:

USE WASD or Arrow Keys to move and Space to jump, Hold left mouse button to charge bubble and release it to launch.
